title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 586.2 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 586.2 - Scope

State Regulations

The regulations apply to the use of all motor vehicles, as described by the New York State Vehicle and Traffic Law, upon all properties
owned or leased by the SUNY Institute of Technology. The regulations apply to
all operators of such motor vehicles including faculty, staff, students and
visitors. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
586.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
